name: CopyFile
description: Copy a single file from one path to another
author: Dustin Oprea

inputs.name: sourceFilepath
inputs.label: Source File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source file that will be copied. Example: $(Build.SourceDirectory)\from_file

inputs.name: targetFilepath
inputs.label: Target File
inputs.helpMarkDown: The destination file to be written. You can use [variables](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=550988). Example: $(Build.ArtifactStagingDirectory)\to_file
